item.description:
The South County Bike Path is not something to be taken lightly. Sure, it's only 5.5 miles long. Sure, there is great homemade ice cream along the way.

But every time we've tried this, we've had to cancel due to rain, snow and even the orders of the national guard!

DON'T LET THEM WIN! SIGN UP FOR THE GREATEST *BIKE RIDE* KNOWN TO MAN.
SIGN UP FOR South County bike path on Friday, August 7th at 6:15pm.

This is not a race, but we don't go at a crawl. Biking should be faster than walking. We've had people in their 20s to their 50s. You don't have to be an Olympic athlete to join us.

This is just as much about meeting some nice folks as it is about enjoying some fresh air.

If it is raining OR I get fewer than 3 YES RSVPs by Thursday night â€“ I will reschedule for another day.

Meet us outside of Brickley's Homemade Ice Cream in Wakefield, RI. If you're good, we might even stop to sample their fine product after the ride.

PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE remember to take my cell phone number: 401-699-7304 in case you can't find us. As usual, I will be sporting my signature red road bike. I don't have access to a phone or to the internet at work, so finding me before the event may prove difficult.

To RSVP, go to http://www.meetup.com...
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red road bike. Try my cell: 401-699-7304.
item.name: South County Bike Path - Attempt #3
